# AirBnb

Load required packages.

```{r load packages, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

library( tidyverse )
library( dplyr )
library( gridExtra )

```

Set up workspace, i.e., remove all existing data from working memory and load data from CSV file.

```{r setup}

rm( list=ls() )
df <- read.csv("./data/airbnb_clean.csv")

```
